Name: Nauticalypse
About the game: Defend your ship from mythologic creatures by building canons, guns and turrets. Find treasures and gold to improve your ship and get further. features Basic crafting system to build torrets, guns, cannons and claws. Waves of mythologic enemies with materials to make new weapons and food. Treasures and gold to improve the attributes of weapons and ship.
